articles.title: Trump administration cancels travel for refugees already cleared to resettle in the U.S. - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: Refugees who'd been approved to travel to the United States before a deadline next week suspending America's refugee resettlement program have had their travel plans canceled by the Trump administration.
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) Refugees who had been approved to travel to the United States before a deadline next week suspending America’s refugee resettlement program have had their travel plans canceled by the… [+4096 chars]
